items.name: B_SPLINES
desc: Data points are connected via a parametric, interpolating B-spline curve.

items.name: CUBIC_SPLINES
desc: Data points are connected via a smoothed cubic spline curve.
The data points themselves are part of to the curve.

items.name: LINES
desc: Lines between data points are not smoothed.

items.name: STEP_CENTER_X
desc: Data points are connected via a 3-segmented stepped line.
The lines is horizontal till the center of the X values.

items.name: STEP_CENTER_Y
desc: Data points are connected via a 3-segmented stepped line.
The lines is horizontal at the center of the Y values.

items.name: STEP_END
desc: Data points are connected via a 2-segmented stepped line.

items.name: STEP_START
desc: Data points are connected via a 2-segmented stepped line.
